channel.title: Error! Please help!
channel.description:
Hello! I get this error when i open the client:
[code]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. Click any button to continue. . .[/code]
Thank you very much for the help!
pkn00b.
